nodes.text: The T-5RZ Onslaught Droid was a battle droid that was utilized by the Coronas, a criminal gang that worked for the corrupt Corellian politician Harmon Torvix. During the Galactic War, the T-5RZ Onslaught Droid was destroyed in the Black Hole region of Corellia by Imperial forces that salvaged the droid's memory core.

The final enemy of the Imperial mission "Asset Liquidation" in the Black Hole, the T-5RZ Onslaught Droid was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole Daily Area.
